response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to us and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand that the true value of this product may vary depending on your needs, but we are confident that this offer presents a great opportunity for you. Should you have any questions or need more information, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
